Name: Sugar Story
About the game: 'Sugar Story' is a great role-playing game with a Time Progress Battle System and simple and crazy story. The day has come ... You've been given a very important mission to get sugar for your family because it's just over. Can you cope with this challenge? I tell you right away, it won't be easy ... You think it's just a quest for sugar and on the way the world turns upside down, evil comes which the world didn't know ... Will you manage to save the world together with your newly met friend? Time will show ... And time runs like crazy through the evil God Amatsu-Mikaboshi . Features: Friend Slime who accompanies you on your journey through the world Time Progress Battle System. (In other words it's a dynamic turn-based system in which you attack as soon as you have strength if your opponent recovers faster, he attacks) Puzzles to solve Fantastic soundtrack Find secrets Lots of interesting Quests Gain experience and learn new skills
Developers: Source Byte Sp. z o.o.,Nikodem Świder
